Subskills.name: Cult's Migration
Subskills.description: Increases the movement speed of cultists.

Subskills.name: Shadow Puppets
Subskills.description: Summon a static cultist. The cultist emmits a portion of all damage taken to nearby monsters as area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Loyal Followers
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of black mass.

Subskills.name: Raise Morale
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana costs of black mass.

Subskills.name: The Devil Within
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a ripple of blood on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Darkness Infused
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by black mass.

Subskills.name: Cult Bishops
Subskills.description: Send forward a cult bishop inflicting burning, dealing increased damage according to your energy and stunning monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Crowd Stomp
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Eternal Corruption
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to summon an additional black mass.

Subskills.name: Murder Frenzy
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Protective Circle
Subskills.description: Increased amount of cultists are now summoned in a circle around target location.

Subskills.name: Loyal Followers
Subskills.description: Summon a horde of static cultists at target location for a short duration dealing increased damage.
